text: Nabii Shuqeybi isi marak: yi maraw isin yoh warisay anu inni Rabbik sin kah seecaah sin elle amrisaah sin kak waasaamak baxxaqqa iyya gitih bagul eneeh, Yalli calaalih yan rizqhiy farakka iyya yoh yeceek, anu maqaanéh sin amrisewaah umaanék sin waasewaam yoo maay celtaah? Baleey yoo macelta, anu sin kak waasa uma taamay innih ciggiilaah abam faxa mayyu, anu sin kah amrisaah sin kak waasaamat kalah faxam mayyu duddu haam sin aymaaqeeh sin caagid aymaaqenkeh iyyaanam akke waytek, anu sin aymaaqeeh cakki gitat gexam yol bicissam matan Yalla akke waytek, anu dibuk kaal keltaah dambittek kaal aduure keenik iyye
